system.description: Effect: The user becomes Enraged until the end of the round, is switched out, or is Fainted. While Enraged, if the user is hit by a damaging attack, they gain +1 ATK stage for 5 activations.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: Effect: The user becomes Enraged until the end of the round, is switched out, or is Fainted. While Enraged, if the user is hit by a damaging attack, they gain +1 ATK stage for 5 activations.
